page.title: 18Buckden Marina
page.content: The{Marina}was built in 1963 and it opened in 1964. In winter{140 boats are kept there and in the summer{160 {boats.}The boats can fill up with petrol or diesel at the Marina. The boats can also be{repaired.}There are {20}different kinds of boats. Some boats have one engine and some have two engines. The boats are only allowed to go at{5 miles an hour}on the river because if they go any faster they are breaking the law. There is an attractive shop for the sailors to buy their food, books to read and clothes to wear on their boats. They{make boats}at the Marina. The biggest boat they are making at present is 35 feet. It will take until January to finish it. It is an ocean-going boat.It will cost Â£90,000.
